page.title: 20My Village.
page.content: I like my village because my friends and family live here.It is a nice little village and has a very interesting history.When I was small I lived in East Anglia,but when Iwas three years old I moved to Esh Winning. The things I like about the village are the people as they are friendly and kind.There are many woods and forests to visit and explore.There are also many farms and hills to walk around and lots of places to go sight seeing. The things I dislike are the vandalism and the robberies.Many shrubs have been planted ,but there is a lot of graffiti. I would like to see a leisure centre in our village with a swimming pool,ski slope,gym,ice rink and roller rink.
